Social distancing and other measures put in place due to the coronavirus pandemic will trigger a spike in flu cases next winter, a study warns.

articles.title: Human case of West Nile Virus confirmed in Hillsborough County, health officials say - ABC Action News
articles.description: The Florida Department of Health in Hillsborough County (DOH-Hillsborough) said Tuesday morning that a human case of West Nile Virus is confirmed in the county.
articles.content:
HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY, Fla. The Florida Department of Health in Hillsborough County (DOH-Hillsborough) said Tuesday morning that a human case of West Nile Virus is confirmed in the county.
